transArray.content: The room was very comfortable, with a hint of orange flavor, as well as orange candies and oranges with orange characteristics. The breakfast was also very good, with various types. The lady in the restaurant was very enthusiastic to cook wontons for me. It was good, and the front desk service was also very good. Recommended!
The hotel's reply: Your compliment is nothing less than a compliment. I am very happy and honored to receive your recognition. We will continue to work hard and welcome you to come again!
